channel.title: Pages on Felix's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Felix's Blog

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a dreamy and old developer who likes to do this and that. The motto of life is Let's live like a bicycle running without boiling. I’d like to share some interesting things. ^-^ The interest Golang In 2019⁄02 I applied to development belatedly and fell in love with it. All the servers are now Golang!! GOGOGO NodeJS I can’t accept this poor language! I’ve been obsessed with the flexibility and simplicity for almost three years since I met him because of the company.

item.title: SharpenCommander
item.description: Developers’ Terminal Experience Improvement Open Source Project! Convenient folder movement Powerful and convenient Git Commit Manage many convenient Git projects Enhanced Find and Grep use (alpha) Improving the use of uncomfortable submodule (Coming soon) Install conveniently on Linux or WSL(Windows Subsystel for Linux) by the following command. $ pip3 install sharpen-commander Experience the New World with ShapenCommander
